body:
I see what you're saying. In that case could we say:

```py
config_setting(
    name = "with_jemalloc",
    values = {"define": "with_jemalloc=true"},
    visibility = ["//visibility:public"],
)
```

And then:

```py
select({
    "//tensorflow:with_jemalloc": select({
        "//tensorflow:linux_x86_64": [...],
        "//tensorflow:linux_ppc64le": [...],
        "//conditions:default": [],
```
